title: Boston National Historical Park: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us            Do Business With Us           The National Park Service (NPS) at Boston National Historical Park (BOST) announces a Request for Proposals (RFP) for the lease of the historic Hoosac Stores Warehouse. The RFP provides the opportunity for interested individuals and organizations to submit proposals to NPS to lease NPS property. The lease opportunity is open to all interested persons on a competitive basis. Hoosac Stores RFP  Historic Drawings:        Foundation Plan             Underpinning             Cross Section             Piling Plan             First Floor Plan        Background Information: Hoosac Stores Survey (as part of Charlestown Navy Yard survey done in 2010)        Building 125    The National Park Service (NPS) at Boston National Historical Park (BOST) announces a Request for Proposals (RFP) for the lease of the historic Building 125 in the Charlestown Navy Yard.  The RFP provide the opportunity for interested individuals and organizations to submit proposals to NPS  to lease NPS property. The lease opportunity is open to all interested persons on a competitive basis. Building 125 RFP Background Information: Building 125 Historic Structures Report (2003) Building 125 Hazardous Materials Survey (2002) - please note that this survey was done prior to rehab work in the building that included some hazmat abatement. Building 125 Survey (Part of Charlestown Navy Yard Survey done in 2010)       Questions for Hoosac Stores RFP Questions for Building 125 RFP Additional Questions for Hoosac Stores RFP (4/17/14) Additional Questions for Building 125 RFP (4/17/14)
